articles.description: A 7-month-old toddler was mauled to death on Monday evening by a stray dog in a Noida gated society.
articles.content:
By Milan Sharma: A seven-month-old child of a labourer was mauled to death by a stray dog in a high-rise society in Uttar Pradeshs Noida on Monday evening.
